modShortDescription: Broken vending machines scattered around the world are now lootable. It will take time to carefully open the machine, but in most cases it's worth it.
modDescription:
Broken vending machines scattered around the world are now lootable.

They contain the same loot as in the working version, but you can also find there just garbage (plastic, paper, empty cans). It will take time to carefully open the machine, but in most cases it’s worth it.

## Changelog

**Version 1.1**

Some users have complained about a bug when updating a location with a vending machine due to a quest (any). Didn’t find an error, but still made some minor edits. Changed the way the vending machine spawned. Now there can be 3 of them!

1. Working vending machine
2. Broken vending machine that can be searched
3. Broken vending machine that cannot be searched

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Okamich/FallOFBabylon-A19/tree/main/FoB-BVMAL)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22025-okami-modlets-fall-of-babylon/).

**Credits:** [Okami](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/okami/)
